reviewtext: It worked quite nicely for a few months, but then the sound started cutting out.Will buy again, as it is the only product I've found to add in-line volume control to headphones for any device, not just iPhones (which I don't have or like) Also, $10 2-3 times a year is definitely worth the convenience in my mind
summary: Works for a while, but the only thing like it for non-iPhone products
